channel.title: Activities on Fenris
channel.description: Recent content in Activities on Fenris

item.title: Data Leadership Cohort
item.description: Co-organized by Fenris with Digital Public and Aspiration, the Data Leadership Cohort (DLC) is an opportunity for peer learning for governance, stewardship and long-term responsible leadership in data-centric missions and ventures. Our first cohort launches in the first quarter of 2022.
